Statistical Analysis Module¶

Statistical analysis utilities.

Functions to compute descriptive statistics, correlations, and simple trends by branch, and to persist the analysis as a JSON report under src/report/.

src.modules.statistical_analysis.analyze_dataset(merged_df)¶

Perform statistical analysis and save a JSON report.

Computes global means, Pearson correlation, per-branch statistics, and simple trend detection of dropout rates. The resulting analysis is saved as a JSON file at src/report/analisi_estadistic.json.

Parameters:

merged_df (DataFrame) – Merged dataset containing performance and dropout metrics.

Return type:

None

Returns:

None. Writes a JSON report to disk and prints its path.
